item.title: Artificial Intelligence - It's Place In Our World
item.description: Originally featured in the MENSA 2020 Vision Special Magazine Also on Scio Artificial Intelligence. Machine Learning. Deep Learning. In our ever-changing society – laden with the latest and greatest technology, it is almost inevitable that you have heard these phrases. Although, usually used interchangeably, I’d like to take this opportunity to highlight stark differences; which are often hidden by the ignorance of media. Artificial Intelligence, AI for short, is any form of machine or algorithm made or generated encompassing the ability to reciprocate and replicate some aspect of human behavioral characteristics.
